translation.Message_0_Page_0: You have proven very useful to us. Let me return the favor.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: If you are injuried or infected, head to Private Roland. I've given him permission to treat you for free.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: If you are dehydrated or starving, Chef Bastien will feed you for free.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Sergeant Thierry is also now allowed to sell you ammunition.
translation.Message_0_Page_4: I've also given you permission to purchase more valuable supplies along with discounts on food and medical supplies.
